name: ai-dashboard-server
description: AI Dashboard Server with ORM, WebSocket, and API endpoints

scripts.test: mocha test/**/*.test.js --reporter json > test/results.json && mocha test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:phase1: mocha test/phase1/*.test.js --reporter json > test/phase1/results.json && mocha test/phase1/*.test.js
scripts.test:phase2: mocha test/phase2/*.test.js --reporter json > test/phase2/results.json && mocha test/phase2/*.test.js
scripts.test:phase3: mocha test/phase3/*.test.js --reporter json > test/phase3/results.json && mocha test/phase3/*.test.js
scripts.test:phase4: mocha test/phase4/*.test.js --reporter json > test/phase4/results.json && mocha test/phase4/*.test.js
scripts.test:phase5: mocha test/phase5/*.test.js --reporter json > test/phase5/results.json && mocha test/phase5/*.test.js
scripts.test:phase6: mocha test/phase6/*.test.js --reporter json > test/phase6/results.json && mocha test/phase6/*.test.js

author: AI Dashboard Team
